resources.string:
Hi, my name is Saurabh! 

I love Cricket. 

I have been fascinated by Test Cricket as far back as I can remember. 

Rahul Dravid has been my favourite batsman for his elegant game and textbook strokeplay. 
I got the wonderful opportunity to meet him as a eight year old, when he was at the pinnacle of his career. 

Cricket is an wholesome game, which only keeps "giving". 
Among the numerous ways Cricket has enriched my life, quick calculations is definitely the most valuable one. 
Constantly calculating the Required Run-Rate, Average, Economy, Strike Rate has in my opinion trained a whole generation in mental math better than schools could ever imagine! 

I will be more than happy to be your personal Cricket Buddy/Analyst/Commentator/Coach. 
You should ask someone else for real Cricket playing tips thoughâ€¦ :)
